dc_title_s: Map of the upper portion of the Sandusky River Basin showing availability of underground water
dc_description_s: Prepared by RUSSELL B. STEIN, Geologist, Ohio Division of Water|Map side also contains legend and explanation of map symbols.|Scale bar lower left corner.|Text includes information about generalized stratigraphic sequence of rocks in the Upper portion of the Sandusky River Basin and the quality of underground water.
